card.name: Jimmy, the Comfort Eater
card.text: Stamina Regen = 2 Hunger 3 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) At the beginning of your first turn, satiate Jimmy, the Comfort Eater’s hunger by 3. Whenever Jimmy, the Comfort Eater is fed, remove a hunger counter from him and put an endurance counter on him.

card.name: Satiation Potion
card.text: Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Satiation Potion: Remove all hunger counters from target permanent. Satiate its hunger by 5.

card.name: Healing Potion
card.text: Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Healing Potion: If target permanent has less endurance counters on it than its starting endurance, put endurance counters on it equal to the difference.

card.name: Rat Swarm
card.text: On Trigger: Each opponent spoils 3. You may spoil 3. If you do, each opponent spoils an additional 3. (They remove 3 counters from Foods they control.)

card.name: Hurricane
card.text: On Trigger: Remove 3 endurance counters from each Structure you don’t control.

card.name: Earthquake
card.text: On Trigger: Remove 6 endurance counters from each Structure in play.

card.name: Questionably Science
card.text: Draw two cards.

card.name: Rat Horde
card.text: On Trigger: Each opponent spoils 4. You may spoil 4. If you do, each opponent spoils an additional 4. (They remove 4 counters from Foods they control.)

card.name: Thief in the Night
card.text: On Trigger: Remove all endurance counters from target item.

card.name: Worker
card.text: Stamina Regen = 1 Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.)

card.name: Food

prop.notes: !related Farm Plot;Wild Rabbit;Berry Bush;Chicken Coop;Varmiae, the Amalgamous Piper;

card.text: Food enters tapped. Tap, Remove 1 endurance counter from Food: Satiate target permanent’s hunger by 1.

card.name: Restoration
card.text: Remove all hunger counters from target ally or survivor. Then if that permanent has less endurance counters than its starting endurance, put endurance counters on it equal to the difference.

card.name: Starving Worker
card.text: Stamina Regen = 1

card.name: Hungry Worker
card.text: Stamina Regen = 2 Hunger 2 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.)

card.name: Skilled Worker
card.text: Stamina Regen = 3 Hunger 2 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.)

card.name: Tower of Knowledge
card.text: At the beginning of your main phase, research.

card.name: Tower of Wealth
card.text: At the beginning of your main phase, draw a card.

card.name: Wildfire
card.text: On Trigger: Remove 2 endurance counters from each Structure you don’t control.

card.name: Plague
card.text: On Trigger: Remove 1 endurance counter from each Food in play and each Ally in play.

card.name: Sabotage
card.text: Reactive Put target card on the stack into its owner’s discard pile.

card.name: Reanimation Ritual
card.text: On Trigger: Put target ally card in your graveyard onto the field under your control.

card.name: Distort
card.text: Reactive Put target card in an event queue into its owner’s discard pile.

card.name: Watchtower
card.text: If an endurance counter would be removed from an ally you control, if it wasn’t part of a cost, you may remove that endurance counter from Watchtower instead. If an ally you control would be destroyed, you may remove an endurance counter from Watchtower instead.

card.name: Wall
card.text: If an endurance counter would be removed from a permanent you control, if it wasn’t part of a cost, you may remove that endurance counter from Wall instead. If a permanent you control would be destroyed, you may remove an endurance counter from Wall instead.

card.name: Storehouse
card.text: If an endurance counter would be removed from a Food you control, if it wasn’t part of a cost, you may remove that endurance counter from Storehouse instead. If a Food you control would be destroyed, you may remove an endurance counter from Storehouse instead.

card.name: Farm Plot
card.text: Tap: Create a Food token.

card.name: Rats
card.text: On Trigger: Each opponent spoils 1. You may spoil 1. If you do, each opponent spoils an additional 1. (They remove 1 counters from Foods they control.)

card.name: Giant
card.text: Stamina Regen = 3

card.name: Calamity Summoner
card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) Event cards you play costs {1} less to play.

card.name: Decay
card.text: On Trigger: Each opponent removes 1 endurance counter from a permanent they control.

card.name: Hound
card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Hound: Create a Decay token in your event queue.

card.name: Wolf
card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Wolf: Create a Decay token in your event queue.

card.name: Alpha Wolf
card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) Other Wolf allies you control enter with an additional endurance counter.

card.name: Wolf Tamer
card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) Wolf allies you control’s hunger value is decreased by 1.

card.name: Minor Distortion
card.text: Put target card in an event queue into its owner’s discard pile.

card.name: Visionary
card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) When Visionary enters the field, research. Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Visionary: Create a Decay token in your event queue.

card.name: Woofbert, the Canine
card.text: Stamina Regen = 3 Hunger 4 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) At the beginning of your first turn, satiate Woofbert, the Canine’s hunger by 4. Whenever a Wolf ally you control enters the field, put an endurance counter on Woofbert, the Canine.

card.name: Nezaron, the Lich
card.text: Stamina Regen = 3 At the beginning of your end step, remove four endurance counters from permanents you control.

card.name: Ilterion, the Studious
card.text: Stamina Regen = 3 Hunger 3 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) At the beginning of your first turn, satiate Ilterion, the Studious’s hunger by 3. If you would put a card on the bottom of your deck from researching, if you’ve researched two or more times this turn, you may put that card into your discard pile instead. If you do, create a Decay token in your event queue.

card.name: Mage Pupil
card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) If you would put a card into your hand from researching, you may put that card into your discard pile instead. If you do, create a Decay token in your event queue.

card.name: Mage Healer
card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) Whenever you research, put an endurance counter on target ally.

card.name: Giant Warrior
card.text: Stamina Regen = 1 Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Giant Warrior: Create a Decay token in your event queue.

card.name: Acolyte of Eziarag
card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) When Acolyte of Eziarag dies, create an Eziarag Summons token.

card.name: Eziarag Summons

prop.notes: !related Acolyte of Eziarag;Dagger of Eziarag;Pendant of Eziarag;

card.text: Tap, Remove 7 endurance counters from Summons items you control: Put a card named Eziarag from your sideboard onto the field.

card.name: Eziarag
card.text: When Eziarag enters the field, if it didn’t enter from your sideboard, remove all endurance counters from it. Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Eziarag: Create three Decay tokens in your event queue.

card.name: Dagger of Eziarag
card.text: Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Dagger of Eziarag, Remove X endurance counters from an Ally you control: Create X Eziarag Summons tokens.

card.name: Pendant of Eziarag
card.text: Tap: Create an Eziarag Summons token.

card.name: Spoilage
card.text: On Trigger: Each opponent spoils X, where X is half the number of Food items they control, rounded down. (They remove X counters from Foods they control.)

card.name: Loaf of Bread
card.text: Loaf of Bread enters tapped. Tap, Remove 1 endurance counter from Loaf of Bread: Satiate target permanent’s hunger by 2.

card.name: Chicken Coop
card.text: {1}, Tap: Create a Food token. {2}, Tap, Destroy a Food item you control: Create three Food tokens.

card.name: Wild Rabbit
card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) When Wild Rabbit dies, create two Food tokens.

card.name: Varmiae, the Amalgamous Piper
card.text: Stamina Regen = 3 Hunger 3 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) At the beginning of your first turn, satiate Varmiae, the Amalgamous Piper’s hunger by 3. Whenever you play a Rat event, choose one — • Research. • Create two Food tokens.

card.name: Rat Infiltration
card.text: On Trigger: Each opponent spoils 3. Then they may pay {3}. If they don’t, put Rat Infiltration back into your event queue after it finishes triggering. (They remove 3 counters from Foods they control.)
